oregano.Name: Oregano
oregano.Directions: Apply topically to the bottoms of feet or dilute with a carrier oil for other topical applications. Can also be diffused aromatically.

lavender.Name: Lavender
lavender.Description: Calming and relaxing aroma. Soothes occasional skin irritations.
lavender.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the skin, or add a few drops to bath water.

lemon.Name: Lemon
lemon.Description: Uplifting and purifying aroma. Can be used to clean surfaces.
lemon.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, add to water for internal use, or apply topically (avoid sunlight for 12 hours).

peppermint.Name: Peppermint
peppermint.Description: Cooling and invigorating aroma. May help ease occasional stomach upset.
peppermint.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to temples and back of neck, or add a drop to water or a veggie capsule for internal use.

frankincense.Name: Frankincense
frankincense.Description: Promotes feelings of relaxation and well-being. Supports healthy skin.
frankincense.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the skin, or take internally in a capsule.

teaTree.Name: Tea Tree (Melaleuca Alternifolia)
teaTree.Description: Cleansing and purifying properties. Beneficial for the skin and scalp.
teaTree.Directions: Apply topically to targeted areas, add to facial cleanser or moisturizer, or apply to scalp during shower.

eucalyptus.Name: Eucalyptus
eucalyptus.Description: Clearing and refreshing aroma. Supports healthy respiratory function.
eucalyptus.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the chest and throat.

rosemary.Name: Rosemary
rosemary.Description: Stimulating and invigorating aroma. May help with focus and concentration.
rosemary.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the temples and back of neck, or add to shampoo for a scalp massage.

cedarwood.Name: Cedarwood
cedarwood.Description: Warm and woody aroma. Promotes relaxation and a grounding atmosphere.
cedarwood.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the bottoms of feet or back of neck.

grapefruit.Name: Grapefruit
grapefruit.Description: Uplifting and energizing aroma. Supports healthy metabolism.
grapefruit.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, add to water for internal use, or apply topically (avoid sunlight for 12 hours).

bergamot.Name: Bergamot
bergamot.Description: Uplifting and joyful aroma. Soothes the skin.
bergamot.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically (avoid sunlight for 12 hours), or add to tea.

patchouli.Name: Patchouli
patchouli.Description: Grounding and balancing aroma. Beneficial for the skin.
patchouli.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to desired areas.

ylangYlang.Name: Ylang Ylang
ylangYlang.Description: Sweet and floral aroma. Promotes feelings of calm and relaxation.
ylangYlang.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the wrists and neck, or add to bath water.

sandalwood.Name: Sandalwood
sandalwood.Description: Rich and woody aroma. Promotes feelings of peace and relaxation.
sandalwood.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the forehead and temples.

chamomile.Name: Chamomile (Roman)
chamomile.Description: Calming and soothing aroma. Supports restful sleep.
chamomile.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the bottoms of feet or back of neck, or add to herbal tea.

clarySage.Name: Clary Sage
clarySage.Description: Herbaceous and slightly floral aroma. Known for its calming properties.
clarySage.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the abdomen, temples, or wrists.

ginger.Name: Ginger
ginger.Description: Warm and spicy aroma. May help ease occasional nausea.
ginger.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the abdomen, or add a drop to water or a veggie capsule for internal use.

cypress.Name: Cypress
cypress.Description: Fresh and woody aroma. Creates a grounding and purifying atmosphere.
cypress.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the chest and feet.

fennel.Name: Fennel
fennel.Description: Sweet and licorice-like aroma. Supports healthy digestion.
fennel.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or take internally in a capsule or water.

juniperBerry.Name: Juniper Berry
juniperBerry.Description: Woody and spicy aroma. Supports healthy skin and urinary tract.
juniperBerry.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to desired areas.

lemongrass.Name: Lemongrass
lemongrass.Description: Citrusy and herbaceous aroma. Energizing and uplifting.
lemongrass.Directions: Diffuse aromatically, apply topically to the temples and back of neck, or add to massage oil.

marjoram.Name: Marjoram
marjoram.Description: Herbaceous and slightly sweet aroma. Calming and soothing.
marjoram.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the back of the neck and shoulders.

melissa.Name: Melissa
melissa.Description: Citrusy and herbaceous aroma. Uplifting and calming.
melissa.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the forehead, temples, or wrists.

myrrh.Name: Myrrh
myrrh.Description: Smoky and earthy aroma. Promotes feelings of grounding and well-being.
myrrh.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the skin.

neroli.Name: Neroli
neroli.Description: Floral and citrusy aroma. Uplifting and calming.
neroli.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the wrists, neck, and temples.

petitgrain.Name: Petitgrain
petitgrain.Description: Fresh and citrusy aroma with woody undertones. Uplifting and relaxing.
petitgrain.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the back of the neck and temples.

rose.Name: Rose
rose.Description: Floral and sweet aroma. Promotes feelings of love and well-being.
rose.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the wrists, neck, and heart area.

spearmint.Name: Spearmint
spearmint.Description: Minty and refreshing aroma. Gentler than peppermint.
spearmint.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the temples, back of neck, or abdomen.

vetiver.Name: Vetiver
vetiver.Description: Earthy and smoky aroma. Grounding and calming.
vetiver.Directions: Diffuse aromatically or apply topically to the bottoms of feet and back of neck.

wintergreen.Name: Wintergreen
wintergreen.Description: Minty and refreshing aroma. Soothing to muscles and joints.
wintergreen.Directions: Apply topically to desired areas (dilute with a carrier oil).
